remarks: A transformation of quantifiers and logical connectives.  The general statement that ~ equs3 proves. This and the following theorems are the general instances of already proved theorems.  They could be moved to the main part, before ~ ax-5 .  I propose to move to the main part: ~ bj-exnalimn , ~ bj-exaleximi , ~ bj-exalimi , ~ bj-ax12i , ~ bj-ax12wlem .  A new label is needed for ~ bj-ax12i and label suggestions are welcome for the others.  I also propose to change ` -. A. x -. ` to ` E. x ` in ~ speimfw and ~ spimfw (other spim* theorems use ` E. x ` and very very few theorems in set.mm use ` -. A. x -. ` ).  (Contributed by BJ, 29-Sep-2019.)
statement: bj-exnalimn $p |- ( E. x ( ph /\ ps ) <-> -. A. x ( ph -> -. ps ) ) $.
